home.title: About Me
home.paragraph1_part3: living in {clujLink}. I love to build software products. I have
home.paragraph1_part4: over 8 years of experience in the industry
home.paragraph1_part5: . Since I remember of my first experience, I have been a big fan of technology, and I try to keep up with all the news of its. The most groundbreaking experience of my life with coding was when I was 12 years old.
home.paragraph2: I have constantly been trying to improve my skills and I don't hesitate when I realize that there is still a lot to learn, so I am always open to new challenges. I can show my best skills, when I find a task that fires my interest up to a level where I will focus 100% on the task and recognize no time nor hungers.
home.paragraph3_part1: Check out my {githubLink} to explore my latest projects and my
home.paragraph3_part3: for a full breakdown of my professional journey.
home.paragraph4: Besides my profession I also love to relax and recharge my batteries with my friends and family and of course by doing my favourite hobbies.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestion, please don't hesitate to contact me. You can do this via social media or email at {email}.

quotes.title: Inspiring Thoughts
quotes.description: These quotes offer moments of clarity, encouragement, and perspective from voices that resonate. They serve as reminders to stay grounded, focused, and purposeful in everyday life.
